body:
Ok, i found the solution by myself. Sorry for the silly question. But i have another question, about this topic. I am using the version 0.0.63 August 2016 of LB. It seems that the components are not updated. I have the same error as the first post.
Should i change the scripts? Where can i find the correct components to have an uniform diffuse radiation dome? Thank you. Marcello.
